head.title: Loews Corp.(LTR,N) reports earnings for Qtr to Sept 30

hedline.hl1: Loews Corp.(LTR,N) reports earnings for Qtr to Sept 30

block.p: b-Net loss c-Included a charge of $ 270.1 million, or $ 4.22 a share, related to an addition to the loss reserve of CNA Financial Corp.'s Continental Casualty Co. subisidiary for asbestos-related bodily injury claims in both the quarter and 9 months. CNA Financial Corp. is an 84 percent-owned subsidiary of Loews. (Loss) Magma Copper (MCU,N) Qtr to Sept 30 1994 1993 Sales 227,074,000 211,877,000 Net inc 22,321,000 8,759,000 Share earns .39 .17 Shares outst 49,313,000 47,597,000 9mo sales 622,140,000 596,632,000 Net inc 50,542,000 b12,859,000 Share earns .85 .25 Shares outst 49,095,000 48,278,000 b-Included accounting adjustment charge of $ 888,000. The latest periods included preferred stock dividends of 6 cents a share, in the quarter and 18 cents a share, in the 9 months. Year-ago periods included preferred stock dividends of 1 cent a share and 2 cents a share, in the quarter and 9 months, respectively.
